name: Nabil
greetingText: I know you are having a great day!
wishText: May you have all the happiness in the world! :)
textInChatBox: Happy birthday to you!! Yeee! Many many happy blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
outroText: I want you to know that I am very proud of you
replayText: May your light continue to shine brightly for years to come!
